attributes.action: change the law for driving bans to start after a prison sentance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently any person given a driving ban as well as a prison sentance starts the ban at the same time as the prison sentance, which is pointless because if they are in prison they are unable to drive anyway, so I propose a change in the law to have the bans start once they leave prison so that the offender feels the effects of the ban being enforced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
